name: AudioChannelMatrixApplyPreset
notes: Set dynamic value 1. Once set, dynamic values can be used in other functions.

name: SetDynamicValue1
valueExample: Value suitable for using in target function
notes: Set dynamic value 1. Once set, dynamic values can be used in other functions.

name: SetDynamicValue2
valueExample: Value suitable for using in target function
notes: Set dynamic value 2. Once set, dynamic values can be used in other functions.

name: SetDynamicValue3
valueExample: Value suitable for using in target function
notes: Set dynamic value 3. Once set, dynamic values can be used in other functions.

name: SetDynamicValue4
valueExample: Value suitable for using in target function
notes: Set dynamic value 4. Once set, dynamic values can be used in other functions.

name: ActivatorRefresh
notes: Refresh all activator device lights and controls.

name: ActiveInput
notes: Send specified input to Output 1.

name: AddInput
valueParam1Notes:
Format "type|filename"

Samples:
Video|c:\path\to\video.avi
Image|c:\path\to\image.jpg
Photos|c:\path\to\folder
Xaml|c:\path\to\title.xaml
VideoList|c:\path\to\playlist.m3u
Colour|HTMLColor
AudioFile|c:\path\to\audio.wav
Flash|c:\path\to\flash.swf
PowerPoint|c:\path\to\powerpoint.pptx
Value = Type|Filename
notes: Create a new input.

name: AdjustCountdown
notes: Seconds to add or subtract from current countdown time.

name: Audio
notes: Toggle audio mute on/off on a single input.

name: AudioBus
notes: Toggle audio bus on/off.

name: AudioBusOff
notes: Turn audio bus off.

name: AudioBusOn
notes: Turn audio bus on.

name: AudioOff
notes: Turn audio off (mute) a single input.

name: AudioOn
notes: Turn audio on (unmute) a single input.

name: AudioPluginOff
notes: Turn off a single audio plugin.

name: AudioPluginOn
notes: Turn on a single audio plugin.

name: AudioPluginOnOff
notes: Toggle on/off single audio plugin.

name: AudioPluginShow
notes: Show audio plugin editor for specified plugin.

name: AutoPlayFirst
notes: Toggle automatically playing first item in a list (with transition).

name: AutoPlayFirstOff
notes: Turn off automatically playing first item in a list (with transition).

name: AutoPlayFirstOn
notes: Turn on automatically playing first item in a list (with transition).

name: AutoPlayNext
notes: Toggle automatically playing next item in a list.

name: AutoPlayNextOff
notes: Stop automatically playing next list item on specified input.

name: AutoPlayNextOn
notes: Automatically play next list item on specified input.

name: BrowserNavigate
notes: Navigate specified browser input to new URL.

name: BusAAudioPluginOff
notes: Turn off specified audio plugin.

name: BusAAudioPluginOn
notes: Turn on specified audio plugin.

name: BusAAudioPluginOnOff
notes: Toggle on/off specified audio plugin.

name: BusAAudioPluginShow
notes: Show audio plugin editor for specified plugin.

name: BusBAudioPluginOff
notes: Turn off specified audio plugin.

name: BusBAudioPluginOn
notes: Turn on specified audio plugin.

name: BusBAudioPluginOnOff
notes: Toggle on/off specified audio plugin.

name: BusBAudioPluginShow
notes: Show audio plugin editor for specified plugin.

name: BusXAudio
notes: Value = Bus (M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G)

name: BusXAudioOff
notes: Value = Bus (M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G)

name: BusXAudioOn
notes: Value = Bus (M,A,B,C,D,E,F,G)

name: BusXAudioPluginOff
notes: Turn off specified audio plugin.

name: BusXAudioPluginOn
notes: Turn on specified audio plugin.

name: BusXAudioPluginOnOff
notes: Toggle on/off specified audio plugin.

name: BusXAudioPluginShow
notes: Show audio plugin editor for specified plugin.

name: CallManagerShowHide
notes: Show/hide the call manager.

name: ChangeCountdown
notes: Change countdown time according to Value as hh:mm:ss (00:00:00)

name: ColourCorrectionAuto
notes: Run basic auto colour correction.

name: ColourCorrectionReset
notes: Reset colour correction to default values.

name: CreateVirtualInput
notes: Create a new Virtual Input from the specified input.

name: CutDirect
notes: Cuts the input directly to Output without changing Preview.

name: DataSourceAutoNextOff
notes: Name of the Data Source, Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

name: DataSourceAutoNextOn
notes: Name of the Data Source, Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

name: DataSourceAutoNextOnOff
notes: Name of the Data Source, Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

name: DataSourceNextRow
notes: Name of the Data Source and Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

name: DataSourcePause
notes: Name of the Data Source and Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

name: DataSourcePlay
notes: Name of the Data Source and Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

name: DataSourcePlayPause
notes: Name of the Data Source and Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

name: DataSourcePreviousRow
notes: Name of the Data Source and Table Name (optional) eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1'

name: DataSourceSelectRow
notes: Name of the Data Source, Table Name (optional) and Row Index starting from 0 eg 'Excel/CSV,Sheet1,5'

name: FadeToBlack
notes: Toggle FTB on/off.

name: Fullscreen
notes: Toggle Fullscreen on/off.

name: InputPreviewHide
notes: Hide large preview of input.

name: InputPreviewShow
notes: Show large preview of input.

name: InputPreviewShowHide
notes: Toggle large preview of input.

name: KeyPress
notes: Send single key press to active window.

name: LastPreset
notes: Load the last preset.

name: LayerOff
notes: Turn off a single layer for specified input.

name: LayerOn
notes: Turn on a single layer for specified input.

name: LayerOnOff
notes: Toggle a single layer for specified input.

name: ListAdd
notes: Add item (filename) to list.

name: ListExport
notes: Export list as M3U to filename.

name: ListRemove
valueParam1Notes: 1 to n (number of items in list)
notes: Remove from list by index.

name: ListRemoveAll
notes: Remove all items from list.

name: ListShuffle
notes: Shuffle list.

name: MasterAudioPluginOff
notes: Turn off specified audio plugin.

name: MasterAudioPluginOn
notes: Turn on specified audio plugin.

name: MasterAudioPluginOnOff
notes: Toggle on/off audio plugin.

name: MasterAudioPluginShow
notes: Show specified audio plugin editor.

name: MoveLayer
notes: Move specified input's layer to new position.

name: MoveMultiViewOverlay
notes: Move overlay in input MultiView to new position in stack.

name: MultiViewOverlay
notes: Toggle on/off MultiView Overlay for input at specified index (starting from 1).

name: MultiViewOverlayOff
notes: Turn off MultiView Overlay for input at specified index (starting from 1).

name: MultiViewOverlayOn
notes: Turn on MultiView Overlay for input at specified index (starting from 1).

name: NDICommand
notes: Send specified command to NDI source

name: NextItem
notes: Move to next item in list.

name: NextPicture
notes: Move to next picture for photo and PowerPoint inputs.

name: NextPlayListEntry
notes: Move to next item in a running playList.

name: OpenPreset
notes: Load preset from the specified file.

name: OverlayInput1
notes: Toggle overlay1 on/off with specified input and stored transition.

name: OverlayInput1In
notes: Transition out to overlay1 with specified input.

name: OverlayInput1Off
notes: Immediately switch overlay1 off (cut)

name: OverlayInput1Out
notes: Transition out overlay1.

name: OverlayInput1Zoom
notes: Zoom PIP overlay to fill fullscreen and vice versa

name: OverlayInputAllOff
notes: Switch all overlays off immediately.

name: PauseCountdown
notes: Pause or resume countdown. If complete, start from beginning.

name: PauseRender
notes: Freeze title input while making updates.

name: PreviewInput
notes: Send specified input to Preview.

name: PreviewInputNext
notes: Send next input to Preview.

name: PreviewInputPrevious
notes: Send previous input to Preview.

name: PreviewOverlayInput1
notes: Preview Overlay1 using the selected input

name: PreviewOverlayInput2
notes: Preview Overlay2 using the selected input

name: PreviewOverlayInput3
notes: Preview Overlay3  using the selected input

name: PreviewOverlayInput4
notes: Preview Overlay4 using the selected input

name: PreviousItem
notes: Move to previous item in list

name: PreviousPicture
notes: Move to previous picture for photo and PowerPoint inputs

name: PreviousPlayListEntry
notes: Move to previous Item in a running playList

name: PTZCreateVirtualInput
notes: Creates a PTZ virtual input with the current position

name: PTZMoveStop
notes: Stop all PTZ movement.

name: PTZMoveToVirtualInputPosition
notes: Moves to the position of the PTZ virtual input without selecting it into Preview.

name: PTZMoveToVirtualInputPositionByIndex
notes: Moves to the position of the PTZ virtual input associated with this input. Index is first input found starting from 0.

name: PTZUpdateVirtualInput
notes: Update selected PTZ virtual input with current position.

name: ReplayCopyLastEvent
notes: Specify event from event list index 0-19

name: ReplayCopySelectedEvent
notes: Specify event from event list index 0-19

name: ReplayDeleteLastEvent
notes: Specify event from event list index 0-19

name: ReplayDeleteSelectedEvent
notes: Specify event from event list index 0-19

name: ReplayDuplicateLastEvent
notes: Specify event from event list index 0-19

name: ReplayDuplicateSelectedEvent
notes: Specify event from event list index 0-19

name: ReplayLastEventCameraOff
notes: Turns off the specified camera angle (1-4)

name: ReplayLastEventCameraOn
notes: Turns on the specified camera angle (1-4)

name: ReplayLastEventSingleCameraOn
notes: Turns on only the specified camera angle (1-4)

name: ReplayMarkInOut
notes: Number of previous seconds to use when creating a new event.

name: ReplayMarkInOutLive
notes: Number of previous seconds to use when creating a new event.

name: ReplayMarkInOutRecorded
notes: Number of previous seconds to use when creating a new event.

name: ReplayMoveLastEvent
notes: Specify event from event list index 0-19

name: ReplayMoveSelectedEvent
notes: Specify event from event list index 0-19

name: ReplayPlayAllEvents
notes: Play all events in active list

name: ReplayPlayAllEventsToOutput
notes: Play all events in active list

name: ReplayPlayEventsByID
valueParam1Notes: Comma-separated list of IDs, each in range 0-1000

name: ReplayPlayEventsByIDToOutput
valueParam1Notes: Comma-separated list of IDs, each in range 0-1000

name: ReplaySelectAllEvents
notes: Select all events in the active channel.

name: ReplaySelectedEventCameraOff
notes: Turns off the specified camera angle (1-8)

name: ReplaySelectedEventCameraOn
notes: Turns on the specified camera angle (1-8)

name: ReplaySelectedEventSingleCameraOn
notes: Turns on only the specified camera angle (1-8)

name: ReplaySetLastEventTextCamera
notes: Changes the text of the specified angle.

name: ReplaySetSelectedEventTextCamera
notes: Changes the text of the specified angle (1-4), example: 3,angle3text

name: ReplaySetSpeed
notes: See SetRateSlowMotion

name: ReplaySwapChannels
notes: Swap A to B and vice versa, includes angles and playback status.

name: ReplayUpdateSelectedInPoint
notes: Update the in point of specified event to current playhead position.

name: ReplayUpdateSelectedOutPoint
notes: Update the out point of specified event to current playhead position.

name: ReplayUpdateSelectedSpeed
notes: Update event to use current playback speed.

name: ReplayUpdateSelectedSpeedDefault
notes: Update event to use default playback speed.

name: Restart
notes: Restart selected Input

name: ResumeRender
notes: Resume Title Input rendering after making multiple updates

name: SavePreset
notes: Save preset to the specified Filename.

name: SaveVideoDelay
notes: Save video clip from Video Delay according to Duration in milliseconds

name: ScriptStartDynamic
notes: Start a dynamic script by passing code as the value.
alert: As of vMix v24.0.0.60, this function has been disabled for security reasons. See this article for details and alternatives.

name: ScriptStopDynamic
alert: As of vMix v24.0.0.60, this function has been disabled for security reasons. See this article for details and alternatives.

name: SelectCategory
valueParam1Notes: One of: All, Red, Green, Orange, Purple, Aqua, Blue
notes: Change to input category.

name: SelectIndex
notes:
Photos,List: Selects item in List according to Value starting from number 1

Virtual Set: Zooms to selected preset using the current speed settings

name: SelectPlayList
notes: Open playList with specified name

name: SendKeys
notes: Send keys to active window

name: SetAlpha
notes: Set Input transparency according to Value. 0 is transparent, 255 is opaque

name: SetCCGainB
notes: Change an input's blue gain level.

name: SetCCGainG
notes: Change an input's green gain level.

name: SetCCGainR
notes: Change an input's red gain level.

name: SetCCGainRGB
notes: Change an input's RGB combined gain level.

name: SetCCGammaB
notes: Change an input's blue gamma level.

name: SetCCGammaG
notes: Change an input's green gamma level.

name: SetCCGammaR
notes: Change an input's red gamma level.

name: SetCCGammaRGB
notes: Change an input's RGB combined gamma level.

name: SetCCHue
notes: Change an input's hue.

name: SetCCLiftB
notes: Change an input's blue lift level.

name: SetCCLiftG
notes: Change an input's green lift level.

name: SetCCLiftR
notes: Change an input's red lift level.

name: SetCCLiftRGB
notes: Change an input's RGB combined lift level.

name: SetCCSaturation
notes: Change an input's saturation level.

name: SetCountdown
notes: Set countdown duration according to Value as hh:mm:ss (00:00:00)

name: SetDynamicInput1
notes: Set dynamic input 1 value. Once set, dynamic inputs values can be used in place of hard-coded input details in other functions.

name: SetDynamicInput2
notes: Set dynamic input 2 value. Once set, dynamic inputs values can be used in place of hard-coded input details in other functions.

name: SetDynamicInput3
notes: Set dynamic input 3 value. Once set, dynamic inputs values can be used in place of hard-coded input details in other functions.

name: SetDynamicInput4
notes: Set dynamic input 4 value. Once set, dynamic inputs values can be used in place of hard-coded input details in other functions.

name: SetFader
notes: Set master fader t-bar position (range 0-255). Setting to 255 will cut to preview

name: SetGain
notes: Value = Gain dB 0-24

name: SetGainChannel1
notes: Value = Gain dB 0-24

name: SetGainChannel2
notes: Value = Gain dB 0-24

name: SetHeadphonesVolume
notes: Value = Volume 0-100

name: SetImage
notes: Change Image in Title according to Filename or empty to clear.

name: SetImageVisible
notes: Toggle image visibility in title. Use SelectedName or SelectedIndex to specify which image to modify.

name: SetImageVisibleOff
notes: Hide Image in title. Use SelectedName or SelectedIndex to specify which image to modify.

name: SetImageVisibleOn
notes: Show image in title. Use SelectedName or SelectedIndex to specify which image to modify.

name: SetInputName
notes: Changes the display name of the specified input.

name: SetMasterVolume
notes: Set fader on master audio bus.

name: SetMultiViewOverlay
notes: Change a single multiview window source on a specified input.

name: SetOutput2
inputNotes: but only if value=Input
valueParam1Notes: One of: Output, Preview, MultiView, Input
notes: Change what is displayed on output 2. If value=Input, specify which input using Input parameter.

name: SetOutput3
inputNotes: but only if value=Input
valueParam1Notes: One of: Output, Preview, MultiView, Input
notes: Change what is displayed on output 3. If value=Input, specify which input using Input parameter.

name: SetOutput4
inputNotes: but only if value=Input
valueParam1Notes: One of: Output, Preview, MultiView, Input
notes: Change what is displayed on output 4. If value=Input, specify which input using Input parameter.

name: SetOutputExternal2
inputNotes: but only if value=Input
valueParam1Notes: One of: Output, Preview, MultiView, Input
notes: Change what is displayed on external output 2. If value=Input, specify which input using Input parameter.

name: SetOutputFullscreen
inputNotes: but only if value=Input
valueParam1Notes: One of: Output, Preview, MultiView, Input
notes: Change what is displayed on the fullscreen output. If value=Input, specify which input using Input parameter.

name: SetOutputFullscreen2
inputNotes: but only if value=Input
valueParam1Notes: One of: Output, Preview, MultiView, Input
notes: Change what is displayed on the fullscreen 2 output. If value=Input, specify which input using Input parameter.

name: SetPanX
notes: Change pan X value of specified input.

name: SetPanY
notes: Change pan Y value of specified input.

name: SetPictureEffect
notes: Set transition effect for Photos and PowerPoint Inputs (Fade, Zoom, etc)

name: SetPictureEffectDuration
notes: Set duration of transition effect in milliseconds

name: SetPictureTransition
notes: Set transition time between photos and PowerPoint slides (in seconds)

name: SetPosition
notes: Set position of specified input in milliseconds

name: SetRate
notes: Set playback speed/rate for videos and video delays

name: SetRateSlowMotion
notes: Set slow motion speed for instant replay

name: SetText
valueExample: My new text line 1%0AMy new text line 2
notes: Change text in title to [value]. Use SelectedName or SelectedIndex to specify which text field to modify. To send line returns, use "%0A" in the value field

name: SetTextColour
notes: Change colour of text in title using HTML format (#xxxxxx). Use SelectedName or SelectedIndex to specify which text field to modify.

name: SetTextVisible
notes: Toggle text visibility in title input. Use SelectedName or SelectedIndex to specify which text field to modify.

name: SetTextVisibleOff
notes: Hide text in a title input. Use SelectedName or SelectedIndex to specify which text field to modify.

name: SetTextVisibleOn
notes: Show text in title input. Use SelectedName or SelectedIndex to specify which text field to modify.

name: SetTickerSpeed
notes: Change ticker speed.

name: SetTransitionDuration1
notes: Change Transition Duration for Button 1

name: SetTransitionDuration2
notes: Change Transition Duration for Button 2

name: SetTransitionDuration3
notes: Change Transition Duration for Button 3

name: SetTransitionDuration4
notes: Change Transition Duration for Button 4

name: SetTransitionEffect1
notes: Change Transition for Button 1

name: SetTransitionEffect2
notes: Change Transition for Button 2

name: SetTransitionEffect3
notes: Change Transition for Button 3

name: SetTransitionEffect4
notes: Change Transition for Button 4

name: SetVolume
notes: Value = Volume 0-100

name: SetVolumeChannel1
notes: When using SeparateMono on an Audio Input, this can be used to set channel volumes independently.

name: SetVolumeChannel2
notes: When using SeparateMono on an Audio Input, this can be used to set channel volumes independently.

name: SetVolumeChannelMixer
notes: Set Volume of an Input's sub channel (1 to 16)

name: SetVolumeFade
notes: Set volume gradually over x milliseconds.

name: SetZoom
notes: Change current zoom level of specified input.

name: Snapshot
valueParam1Notes: Filename can specify date - see example
notes: Create a snapshot image of the current Output. Optional Value specifies save Filename, otherwise a save file window will appear. Filename can specify date, for example mysnapshot {0:dd MMM yyyy}.jpg

name: SnapshotInput
valueParam1Notes: Filename can specify date - see example
notes: Create a snapshot image of the selected Input. Optional Value specifies save Filename, otherwise a save file window will appear. Filename can specify date, for example mysnapshot {0:dd MMM yyyy}.jpg

name: StartSRTOutput
notes: Start SRT output.

name: StartStopSRTOutput
notes: Toggle SRT output.

name: StartStopStreaming
valueParam1Notes: 0-2, or leave blank for all streams
notes: Optional stream number starting from 0. Leave blank to control all streams.

name: StartStreaming
valueParam1Notes: 0-2, or leave blank for all streams
notes: Optional stream number starting from 0. Leave blank to control all streams.

name: Stinger1
inputNotes: but input can be specified. Source in preview used if no input specified.

name: Stinger2
inputNotes: but input can be specified. Source in preview used if no input specified.

name: Stinger3
inputNotes: but input can be specified. Source in preview used if no input specified.

name: Stinger4
inputNotes: but input can be specified. Source in preview used if no input specified.

name: StopCountdown
notes: Stop and Reset Countdown

name: StopSRTOutput
notes: Stop SRT output.

name: StopStreaming
valueParam1Notes: 0-2, or leave blank for all streams
notes: Optional stream number starting from 0. Leave blank to control all streams.

name: StreamingSetKey
valueParam1Notes: 0-2, or leave blank for all streams
notes: Set Key on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,mystreamkey

name: StreamingSetPassword
valueParam1Notes: 0-2, or leave blank for all streams
notes: Set Password on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,password

name: StreamingSetURL
valueParam1Notes: 0-2, or leave blank for all streams
notes: Set URL on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,rtmp://myurl/

name: StreamingSetUsername
valueParam1Notes: 0-2, or leave blank for all streams
notes: Set username on custom RTMP stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,username.

name: SuspendCountdown
notes: Pause countdown.

name: Transition1
notes: Clicks the first transition button in the main vMix window.

name: Transition2
notes: Clicks the second transition button in the main vMix window.

name: Transition3
notes: Clicks the third transition button in the main vMix window.

name: Transition4
notes: Clicks the fourth transition button in the main vMix window.

name: VideoCallAudioSource
notes: Master,Headphones,BusA,BusB,BusC,BusD,BusE,BusF,BusG

name: VideoCallVideoSource
notes: Output1,Output2,Output3,Output4

name: VideoDelayStartRecording
notes: Start video delay recording

name: VideoDelayStartStopRecording
notes: Toggle video delay recording

name: VideoDelayStopRecording
notes: Stop video delay recording

name: WaitForCompletion
notes: Wait for a video input to reach the end of playback. Used in web scripting to pause script execution.

name: WriteDurationToRecordingLog
notes: Write current recording duration to log file with optional tag text Value.

name: OverlayInput1Last
notes: Toggle overlay 1 on/off with last used input on this channel.

name: OverlayInput2Last
notes: Toggle overlay 2 on/off with last used input on this channel.

name: OverlayInput3Last
notes: Toggle overlay 3 on/off with last used input on this channel.

name: OverlayInput4Last
notes: Toggle overlay 4 on/off with last used input on this channel.

name: Fade
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run fade transition.

name: Zoom
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run zoom transition.

name: Wipe
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run wipe transition.

name: Slide
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run slide transition.

name: Fly
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run fly transition.

name: CrossZoom
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run cross-zoom transition.

name: FlyRotate
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run fly-rotate transition.

name: Cube
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run cube transition.

name: CubeZoom
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run cube-zoom transition.

name: VerticalWipe
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run vertical wipe transition.

name: VerticalSlide
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run vertical slide transition.

name: Merge
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run merge transition.

name: WipeReverse
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run wipe-reverse transition.

name: SlideReverse
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run slide-reverse transition.

name: VerticalWipeReverse
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run vertical-wipe-reverse transition.

name: VerticalSlideReverse
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Run vertical-slide-reverse transition.

name: SetColor
mixNotes: defaults to main output (Mix 0), specify Mix 0-3 if required.
inputNotes: source in preview used if no input specified.
notes: Change color of title element using HTML #xxxxxxxx format. Use SelectedIndex or SelectedValue parameters to select object in title.

name: ReplaySetChannelAToBTimecode
notes: Set A timecode to B timecode.

name: ReplaySetChannelBtoATimecode
notes: Set B timecode to A timecode.

name: ReplaySetTimecode
notes: Set position to timecode - format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fff
